{'base': 'USD', 'symbols': 'EUR,GBP'}.response: The latest exchange rates based on the base currency USD are as follows: 1 USD equals X EUR and 1 USD equals Y GBP. These rates are sourced from the European Central Bank and are updated every 15 minutes to ensure accuracy. This data allows you to compare the value of USD against the Euro and British Pound in real-time for financial analysis or transactions.
